org.qbroker.jms

Class JSONFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.jms.JSONFormatter

  • public class JSONFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    JSONFormatter formats JSON payload in a message with a sequence of operations. Certain operation may contain a template and a substitution to format the JSON text from of both the message and the JSON payload. Then the result will be parsed into JSON data and applied to the JSON payload. Currently, the supported operations are get, set, parse, merge, union, select, remove, first, last, sort and uniq, etc.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
